cast.name: 伊布努·贾米尔 Ibnu Jamil

writer.name: 法加·努格鲁斯 Fajar Nugros

director.name: 法加·努格鲁斯 Fajar Nugros

introduction: Born in a simple family in Tarakan does not make Onggy (Dion Wiyoko) to stop dreaming. He wants to see the world, get out of Borneo. After getting the blessing from his family, Onggy goes to continue his studies to Surabaya. Armed with the values of life given by his father (Chew Kin Wah), Onggy undergoes his business struggles: ranging from selling apple, roasted corn, and crackers. Then Candra (Laura Basuki) comes into his life by accident in a beauty salon. Onggy does not wait long to marry Candra. Together with Candra, he undergoes a process of achieving his goals.
